serverSide.entities

Class RefereeSiteClientProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverSide.entities.RefereeSiteClientProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoachCloning, RefereeCloning, java.lang.Runnable

    public class RefereeSiteClientProxy
extends java.lang.Thread
implements RefereeCloning, CoachCloning
    Service Provider agent for access to the Referee Site Implementation of client-servev model of type 2 (server replication) Communication is based on passing messages over sockets using TCP protocol
